divs: sighting detailsone night last fall, i had fallen asleep on the couch in my living room. around 3:30 or 4 in the morning, something startled me awake. i looked up and an entity was standing over me. he\she\it appeared to be between 5 to 6 feet tall, with white skin and the usual large, black eyes. the eyes were shiny, deep, and about 3 inches across and angular. the entity was thin, but not excruciatingly so, with a larger head. the entity appeared to be wearing some sort of stretchy suit, but i was too focused on the face to really notice much else. i did notice that the hands were long (as if they had an extra joint in each finger) with dark colored nails. i had never had an experience of that kind before, but i wasn't even remotely afraid. actually, and i feel like an idiot thinking back on it, i had this uncontrollable urge to laugh. i felt inexplicably happy and just laughed. the entity bent down as if to observe me (the movement was unusual and fluid in a way). i had the impression of curiosity. then the entity was just gone. it wasn't so much as if the entity had disappeared, but more like i had rolled onto a different plane. my mother, who had just begun to get ready for work, came into the room and asked me what was so funny and why i was awake. i was still laughing and talked gibberish, so she assumed i was sleep talking. my life hasn't been the same since that night, and i joined the air force that same week.
